channel.title: Can't Register a Server? Website errors?
channel.description:
I get this every time I try to register my server, WTF:
[code]Welcome pistolpete332!
Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188
Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188
Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188 Further Action Required, Read: New server "..." .....[/code]
I don't understand whatsoever....

item.title: Can't Register a Server? Website errors?
item.dc:creator: @beast_k0 beast k0
item.description:
@beast_k0 wrote:

yeah, it’s happening to everybody. and MITB wont fucking fix this, so i guess bye-bye status page.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't Register a Server? Website errors?
